product_short_description: Premium laptop with 11th Gen Intel Core or AMD Ryzen processors, PixelSense touchscreen, and Alcantara keyboard.
product_long_description: Experience performance and style with the Microsoft Surface Laptop 4. Whether you choose the power of 11th Gen Intel Core or the efficiency of AMD Ryzen processors, it offers a PixelSense touchscreen and a luxurious Alcantara keyboard.
product_highlights: Available with 11th Gen Intel Core or AMD Ryzen processors
13.5-inch or 15-inch PixelSense touchscreen display options
Up to 32GB RAM and up to 1TB SSD for fast and efficient performance
Alcantara or metal keyboard options for a premium typing experience
Omnisonic speakers with Dolby Atmos for immersive audio
Windows Hello for secure facial recognition login

product_short_description: Versatile 2-in-1 tablet with 13-inch PixelSense display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and optional 5G connectivity.
product_long_description: Empower your creativity and productivity with the Microsoft Surface Pro 8. This versatile 2-in-1 tablet features a 13-inch PixelSense display, powerful 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and the option for 5G connectivity on the go.
product_highlights: 13-inch PixelSense touchscreen display with 2880 x 1920 pixels resolution
Up to 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor for fast and responsive performance
Available with up to 32GB RAM and up to 1TB SSD storage
USB-C and USB-A ports, plus Surface Connect for versatile connectivity
Optional 5G connectivity for high-speed internet on the go
Up to 15.5 hours of battery life for all-day productivity

product_short_description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K gaming, ray tracing, high-speed SSD, and Xbox Game Pass integration.
product_long_description: Immerse yourself in the future of gaming with the Microsoft Xbox Series X. Featuring 4K gaming, ray tracing, a high-speed SSD, and seamless integration with Xbox Game Pass, it delivers a powerful and immersive gaming experience.
product_highlights: AMD Ryzen Zen 2 Octa-core processor for fast and responsive gaming
12 teraflops of GPU power for stunning visuals and ray tracing
1TB custom NVMe SSD for high-speed game loading and responsiveness
Backward compatibility for thousands of Xbox, Xbox 360, and Xbox One games
Xbox Game Pass subscription service for access to a vast library of games
Quick Resume feature for jumping between multiple games seamlessly

product_short_description: High-performance all-in-one PC with 28-inch PixelSense display, Intel Core i9 processor, and NVIDIA RTX 30-series GPU.
product_long_description: Unleash your creativity with the Microsoft Surface Studio 3. This high-performance all-in-one PC features a large 28-inch PixelSense display, Intel Core i9 processor, and powerful NVIDIA RTX 30-series GPU for demanding creative tasks.
product_highlights: 28-inch PixelSense display with 4500 x 3000 pixels resolution and 3:2 aspect ratio
Available with Intel Core i7 or i9 processor for exceptional performance
Up to 64GB RAM and up to 2TB SSD for fast and efficient multitasking
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060, RTX 3070, or RTX 3080 GPU options
Surface Pen and Surface Dial for intuitive and precise creative inputs
Adjustable hinge for transitioning between Studio Mode and Desktop Mode

product_short_description: Ergonomically designed keyboard for comfortable typing, with split keyset and cushioned palm rest.
product_long_description: Enhance your typing experience with the Microsoft Ergonomic Keyboard. Designed for comfort, it features a split keyset, cushioned palm rest, and dedicated shortcut keys for efficient and ergonomic typing.
product_highlights: Ergonomically designed split keyset for natural wrist and hand positioning
Cushioned palm rest for comfortable typing over extended periods
Dedicated shortcut keys for quick access to media controls and more
Wired USB connection for reliable and responsive connectivity
Compatible with Windows operating systems for seamless integration
Quiet and responsive keys for a satisfying typing experience

product_short_description: Wireless over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, touch controls, and immersive sound.
product_long_description: Immerse yourself in music and productivity with the Microsoft Surface Headphones 2. Featuring active noise cancellation, intuitive touch controls, and rich sound, they provide a premium audio experience for work and leisure.
product_highlights: 13 levels of active noise cancellation for a distraction-free experience
Omnisonic sound for rich and immersive audio quality
On-ear touch controls for adjusting volume, answering calls, and more
Up to 20 hours of battery life for extended use on a single charge
Comfortable over-ear design with plush ear cups for all-day wear
Built-in microphones for clear voice capture during calls

product_short_description: Collaboration device with 50-inch PixelSense display, 4K camera, and Microsoft Teams integration.
product_long_description: Transform your collaboration experience with the Microsoft Surface Hub 2S. Featuring a large 50-inch PixelSense display, 4K camera, and Microsoft Teams integration, it's designed for seamless and interactive teamwork.
product_highlights: 50-inch PixelSense display with 3840 x 2560 pixels resolution and 3:2 aspect ratio
4K camera with wide-angle lens for clear and inclusive video conferencing
Microsoft Teams integration for seamless collaboration and communication
Slim and lightweight design for easy mobility within the workplace
Surface Pen and touch support for interactive and intuitive presentations
Upgradable processor cartridge for future-proofing your investment

product_short_description: Compact and portable wireless mouse with smooth scrolling and comfortable design.
product_long_description: Stay productive on the go with the Microsoft Modern Mobile Mouse. Featuring a compact and portable design, smooth scrolling, and wireless connectivity, it's the perfect companion for your laptop or tablet.
product_highlights: Compact and portable design for on-the-go productivity
Smooth scrolling for easy navigation through documents and websites
Wireless connectivity with a range of up to 33 feet
Ambidextrous design for comfortable use with either hand
Available in various colors to suit your style and preferences
Up to 12 months of battery life for long-lasting usage
